titleStmt.title: The true English government, and mis-government of the four last kings, with the ill consequences thereof, briefly noted in two little tracts
titleStmt.author: Stephens, Edward, d. 1706.

notesStmt.note: Attributed to Edward Stephens (Socrates Christianus). Cf. Halkett & Laing (2nd ed.)
Reproduction of original in Huntington Library.
